name: Only the triangle fits
description:
Objective: Fit the triangle on his shape!

Use the arrows to move the shapes. 

Code and Design: Filipe Otero Prado.

Acess https://www.filipeop.com/ for more :)

Music: Favorite - Alexander Nakarada (Available at: https://freepd.com/electronic.php)

SFX: space ship shield - bart (Available at: https://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-shield-sounds)
